cases.title: CDC & Federal Health Data Removal
cases.mechanism: Executive orders and agency directives removing public health datasets and web content.
cases.impact: Loss of access to gender identity, HIV, DEI, and other federal health documentation.
sources: KFF: Federal Health Data Taken Offline (2025)
Guardian: Judge orders CDC & FDA to restore webpages

cases.title: Termination of U.S. Hunger Survey (USDA)
cases.mechanism: Cancellation of the annual household food insecurity survey.
cases.impact: Suppression of accountability data on hunger; blind spot for researchers and advocates.
sources: AP News: Trump administration ends government's annual report on hunger
USDA press release: USDA Terminates Food Insecurity Survey

cases.title: Yuchi Language Endangerment
cases.mechanism: Language suppression and generational disruption through English-only schooling.
cases.impact: Loss of oral traditions, ancestral stories, ecological naming systems.

cases.title: Burning of al-Nuri Library
cases.mechanism: Armed conflict destruction of manuscripts and archives.
cases.impact: Loss of manuscripts on history, jurisprudence, astronomy, and cultural heritage.

cases.title: Maldives Internet Media Blockade
cases.mechanism: Government-mandated internet blackout and media takedowns.
cases.impact: Suppression of local dissenting narratives and erasure of on-the-ground reporting.

cases.title: Disbanding of DACOWITS (Defense Advisory Committee on Women in the Services)
cases.mechanism: Executive decision to terminate an advisory body that shaped policies and memory regarding women in the military — cited as ‘divisive feminist agenda’
cases.impact: Loss of continuity, suppression of institutional advisory voice on women’s service, erasure of future recommendations and historical insight
sources: Reuters: Pentagon disbands panel on military women (23 Sept 2025)
The Guardian: Hegseth dissolves women’s military committee (Sept 2025)
